title: I will not step into this office after Presidential elections; anybody can conduct the elections – Election Commissioner exclaims in disgust
content: Lanka E News The Elections Commissioner Dayananda Dissanayake at a meeting today (19) with the political party secretaries and representatives said, as the State media are not abiding by his orders, and undue pressures are being brought on the competent authority appointed by him, he had relieved the competent authority of his duties with effect…
